briefTitle: Safety and Efficacy Study of Axid Use in Infants Suffering From Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
officialTitle: A Double-Blind, Randomized, Parallel, Multicenter Study of Axid (Nizatidine) Oral Solution in the Treatment of Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD) Symptoms in Infants Age 30 Days-1 Year
summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, acceptability, and safety of Axid Oral Solution versus placebo in the treatment of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD) in infants age 30 days up to 1 year.

primaryOutcome.measure: Infant Gastroesophageal Reflux Questionnaire Revised (I-GERQ-R) Success
